Getting help¶

There are times when you really need to get ahold of the programmer, maybe because you found a nasty bug.

Be it for the command line interface, or the API, I’m available to help.

How do I contact you?¶

Your best bet would be to e-mail me. I usually read my e-mail several times a day, but do not always have the time to write down comprehensive reply, so you might need to wait a little, for example if I need to do some testing on my own.

Where can I find your e-mail address?¶

The e-mail address I am using at any given point in time is listed on my Web site. You can also find my GPG public key there (as well as on public key servers), should you need to send me something securely.
